text: vahee allaah hai jisake siva koee poojy nahin. baadashaah hai atyant pavitr, sarvatha salaamatee, nishchintata pradaan karanevaala, sanrakshak, prabhutvashaalee, prabhaavashaalee (tute hue ko jodanevaala), apanee badaee prakat karanevaala. mahaan aur uchch hai allaah us shirk se jo ve karate hai
